form.properties: Top = 337 Left = 453 Width = 520 Height = 200 DataSource = .NULL. Name = "Dataenvironment"
Height = 218 Width = 588 DoCreate = .T. AutoCenter = .T. Caption = "Usuarios" Icon = ..\interface\icono.ico Name = "Form1"
form.methods:
PROCEDURE comandos LPARAMETERS l1, l2, l3, l4, l5, l6, l7, l8, l9, l10, l11, l12, l13
THISFORM.Command1.ENABLED = l1 && Primero THISFORM.Command2.ENABLED = l2 && Anterior THISFORM.Command3.ENABLED = l3 && Siguiente THISFORM.Command4.ENABLED = l4 && Último
THISFORM.Command5.ENABLED = l5 && Modificar THISFORM.Command6.ENABLED = l6 && Cancelar
THISFORM.Command7.ENABLED = l7 && Nuevo THISFORM.Command8.ENABLED = l8 && Deshacer THISFORM.Command9.ENABLED = l9 && Guardar THISFORM.Command10.ENABLED = l10 && Borrar
THISFORM.Command11.ENABLED = l11 && Buscar
THISFORM.Command12.ENABLED = l12 && Imprimir
ThisForm.Command13.enabled = l13 && Salir ENDPROC PROCEDURE Init SET EXACT ON SET ANSI ON SET DATE TO DMY SET DELETED ON SET ESCAPE OFF SET TALK OFF SET CENTURY ON SET DECIMALS TO 4 SET REPROCESS TO 10 && Para red SET MULTILOCKS ON
THIS.CAPTION = 'Usuarios - Pruebas de Git/GitHub' *This.Width = 585 *This.BorderStyle = 2 THIS.comandos(.T.,.T.,.T.,.T.,.T.,.F.,.T.,.F.,.F.,.T.,.T.,.T.,.T.)
THIS.SETALL('ENABLED', .F., 'TextBox') THIS.SETALL('ENABLED', .F., 'EditBox') THIS.SETALL('ENABLED', .F., 'ComboBox') THIS.SETALL('ENABLED', .F., 'Spinner')
ENDPROC PROCEDURE validar * -- Debe indicar Usuario IF LEN(ALLTRIM(ThisForm.txtUsuario.Value))=0 THEN MESSAGEBOX("Debe indicar el Usuario.", 16, "Sistema") RETURN .F. ENDIF
* -- Debe indicar el Nombre IF LEN(ALLTRIM(ThisForm.txtNombre.Value))=0 THEN MESSAGEBOX("Debe indicar el Nombre.", 16, "Sistema") RETURN .F. ENDIF
* -- TODO BIEN RETURN .T. ENDPROC

form.properties: Top = 20 Left = 10 Height = 90 Width = 90 Alias = "usuarios" BufferModeOverride = 5 Order = "idusuario" Database = ..\datos\vfpcongit.dbc CursorSource = "usuarios" Name = "Cursor1"
Top = 11 Left = 14 Height = 30 Width = 30 Picture = iconos\arrow_top.bmp DisabledPicture = iconos\arrow_top.bmp Caption = "" TabIndex = 1 ToolTipText = "Primero" Name = "Command1"
form.methods:
PROCEDURE Click SELECT usuarios IF NOT EOF() GO TOP IN usuarios IF EOF() GO TOP IN usuarios ENDIF ENDIF
THISFORM.REFRESH
ENDPROC

form.properties: Top = 11 Left = 294 Height = 30 Width = 30 Picture = iconos\trash.bmp DisabledPicture = iconos\trash_g.bmp Caption = "" Enabled = .T. TabIndex = 10 ToolTipText = "Borrar" Name = "Command10"
form.methods:
PROCEDURE Click *!* IF !permisos.key25_ then *!* cerrado() *!* RETURN .T. *!* ENDIF
IF MESSAGEBOX('Realmente desea eliminar a...' + CHR(13) + ; ALLTRIM(usuarios.nombre) + '?', 36, 'Sistema') = 6 **BEGIN TRANSACTION SELECT usuarios DELETE THISFORM.Command2.CLICK **END TRANSACTION = TABLEUPDATE(.T.) ENDIF
ENDPROC

form.properties: Top = 11 Left = 428 Height = 30 Width = 30 Picture = iconos\search.bmp DisabledPicture = iconos\search_g.bmp Caption = "" TabIndex = 11 ToolTipText = "Buscar(F2)" Name = "Command11"
form.methods:
PROCEDURE Click cLista1 = 'idusuario,usuario,nombre' cLista2 = 'ID,Usuario,Nombre' cLista3 = '40,170,180' DO FORM buscar WITH 'usuarios', 'N', 3, cLista1, 'idusuario', cLista2, cLista3 TO respuesta IF respuesta > 0 SELECT usuarios SEEK respuesta THISFORM.REFRESH ENDIF
ENDPROC

form.properties: Top = 11 Left = 463 Height = 30 Width = 30 Picture = iconos\printer_16.bmp DisabledPicture = iconos\printer_16_g.bmp Caption = "" TabIndex = 12 ToolTipText = "Imprimir" Name = "Command12"
form.methods: PROCEDURE Click REPORT FORM usuarios.frx NOCONSOLE PREVIEW IN SCREEN TO PRINTER PROMPT ENDPROC

form.properties: Top = 11 Left = 543 Height = 30 Width = 30 Picture = iconos\door_out16.bmp DisabledPicture = iconos\door_out16_g.bmp Caption = "" TabIndex = 13 ToolTipText = "Salir(Alt+X)" Name = "Command13"
Top = 11 Left = 44 Height = 30 Width = 30 Picture = iconos\arrow_back.bmp DisabledPicture = iconos\arrow_back_g.bmp Caption = "" TabIndex = 2 ToolTipText = "Anterior" Name = "Command2"
form.methods:
PROCEDURE Click SELECT usuarios IF NOT BOF() SKIP -1 IF BOF() GO TOP ENDIF ENDIF
THISFORM.REFRESH
ENDPROC

form.properties: Top = 11 Left = 74 Height = 30 Width = 30 Picture = iconos\arrow_next.bmp DisabledPicture = iconos\arrow_next_g.bmp Caption = "" TabIndex = 3 ToolTipText = "Siguiente" Name = "Command3"
form.methods:
PROCEDURE Click SELECT usuarios IF NOT EOF() SKIP IF EOF() GO BOTTOM ENDIF ENDIF
THISFORM.REFRESH
ENDPROC

form.properties: Top = 11 Left = 104 Height = 30 Width = 30 Picture = iconos\arrow_down.bmp DisabledPicture = iconos\arrow_down_g.bmp Caption = "" TabIndex = 4 ToolTipText = "Ultimo" Name = "Command4"
form.methods:
PROCEDURE Click SELECT usuarios IF NOT EOF() GO BOTTOM IN usuarios IF BOF() GO BOTTOM IN usuarios ENDIF ENDIF
THISFORM.REFRESH
ENDPROC

form.properties: Top = 11 Left = 139 Height = 30 Width = 30 Picture = iconos\reply.bmp DisabledPicture = iconos\reply_g.bmp Caption = "" Enabled = .T. TabIndex = 5 ToolTipText = "Editar" Name = "Command5"
form.methods:
PROCEDURE Click *!* IF !permisos.key23_ then *!* cerrado() *!* RETURN .T. *!* ENDIF
IF RECCOUNT() > 0 *BEGIN TRANSACTION *SET SKIP OF MENU _MSYSMENU .T.
THISFORM.CLOSABLE = .F. THISFORM.comandos(.F.,.F.,.F.,.F.,.F.,.T.,.F.,.F.,.F.,.F.,.F.,.F.,.F.)
THISFORM.SETALL('ENABLED', .T., 'TextBox') THISFORM.SETALL('ENABLED', .T., 'EditBox') THISFORM.SETALL('ENABLED', .T., 'ComboBox') THISFORM.SETALL('ENABLED', .T., 'Spinner')
THISFORM.txtIdUsuario.ENABLED = .F.
THISFORM.REFRESH
ELSE MESSAGEBOX('No hay datos para modificar.', 64, 'Sistema') ENDIF
ENDPROC

form.properties: Top = 11 Left = 169 Height = 30 Width = 30 Picture = iconos\save_.bmp DisabledPicture = iconos\save_g.bmp Caption = "" Enabled = .T. TabIndex = 6 ToolTipText = "No editar" Name = "Command6"
form.methods:
PROCEDURE Click IF THISFORM.validar() nRes = MESSAGEBOX('¿Guardar los cambios?', 35, 'GUARDAR!!!') DO CASE CASE nRes = 6 && Si **END TRANSACTION SELECT usuarios = TABLEUPDATE(.T.)
*SET SKIP OF MENU _MSYSMENU .F.
THISFORM.comandos(.T.,.T.,.T.,.T.,.T.,.F.,.T.,.F.,.F.,.T.,.T.,.T.,.T.) THISFORM.SETALL('ENABLED', .F., 'TextBox') THISFORM.SETALL('ENABLED', .F., 'EditBox') THISFORM.SETALL('ENABLED', .F., 'ComboBox') THISFORM.SETALL('ENABLED', .F., 'CheckBox') THISFORM.SETALL('ENABLED', .F., 'Spinner')
THISFORM.CLOSABLE = .T. THISFORM.REFRESH
CASE nRes = 7 && No **ROLLBACK SELECT usuarios = TABLEUPDATE(.T.)
*SET SKIP OF MENU _MSYSMENU .F.
THISFORM.comandos(.T.,.T.,.T.,.T.,.T.,.F.,.T.,.F.,.F.,.T.,.T.,.T.,.T.) THISFORM.SETALL('ENABLED', .F., 'TextBox') THISFORM.SETALL('ENABLED', .F., 'EditBox') THISFORM.SETALL('ENABLED', .F., 'ComboBox') THISFORM.SETALL('ENABLED', .F., 'CheckBox') THISFORM.SETALL('ENABLED', .F., 'Spinner')
THISFORM.CLOSABLE = .T. THISFORM.REFRESH CASE nRes = 2 && Cancelar ENDCASE ENDIF
ENDPROC

form.properties: Top = 11 Left = 204 Height = 30 Width = 30 Picture = iconos\doc.bmp DisabledPicture = iconos\doc_g.bmp Caption = "" Enabled = .T. TabIndex = 7 ToolTipText = "Nuevo(Alt+Q)" Name = "Command7"
form.methods:
PROCEDURE Click *!* IF !permisos.key24_ then *!* cerrado() *!* RETURN .T. *!* ENDIF
THISFORM.comandos(.F.,.F.,.F.,.F.,.F.,.F.,.F.,.T.,.T.,.F.,.F.,.F.,.F.)
THISFORM.SETALL('ENABLED', .T., 'TextBox') THISFORM.SETALL('ENABLED', .T., 'EditBox') THISFORM.SETALL('ENABLED', .T., 'ComboBox') THISFORM.SETALL('ENABLED', .T., 'CheckBox') THISFORM.SETALL('ENABLED', .T., 'Spinner')
THISFORM.CLOSABLE = .F.
*SET SKIP OF MENU _MSYSMENU .T.
SELECT usuarios APPEND BLANK
THISFORM.REFRESH
*THISFORM.txtIdUsuario.VALUE = 0 THISFORM.txtIdUsuario.Enabled = .F. THISFORM.txtUsuario.SETFOCUS
ENDPROC

form.properties: Top = 11 Left = 234 Height = 30 Width = 30 Picture = iconos\descartar.bmp DisabledPicture = iconos\descartar_g.bmp Caption = "" Enabled = .T. TabIndex = 8 ToolTipText = "Deshacer(Alt+D)" Name = "Command8"
form.methods:
PROCEDURE Click IF MESSAGEBOX('¿Descartar los cambios?', 36, 'Sistema') = 6 then **ROLLBACK SELECT usuarios = TABLEREVERT(.T.)
THISFORM.comandos(.T.,.T.,.T.,.T.,.T.,.F.,.T.,.F.,.F.,.T.,.T.,.T.,.T.)
THISFORM.SETALL('ENABLED', .F., 'TextBox') THISFORM.SETALL('ENABLED', .F., 'EditBox') THISFORM.SETALL('ENABLED', .F., 'ComboBox') THISFORM.SETALL('ENABLED', .F., 'CheckBox') THISFORM.SETALL('ENABLED', .F., 'Spinner')
THISFORM.CLOSABLE = .T.
*SET SKIP OF MENU _MSYSMENU .F.
THISFORM.command2.CLICK THISFORM.REFRESH ENDIF
ENDPROC

form.properties: Top = 11 Left = 264 Height = 30 Width = 30 Picture = iconos\save_.bmp DisabledPicture = iconos\save_g.bmp Caption = "" Enabled = .T. TabIndex = 9 ToolTipText = "Guardar(Alt+G)" Name = "Command9"
form.methods:
PROCEDURE Click IF THISFORM.validar() THEN IF MESSAGEBOX('Estan correctos los datos?', 36, 'GUARDAR!!') = 6 THEN THISFORM.comandos(.T.,.T.,.T.,.T.,.T.,.F.,.T.,.F.,.F.,.T.,.T.,.T.,.T.)
THISFORM.SETALL('ENABLED', .F., 'TextBox') THISFORM.SETALL('ENABLED', .F., 'EditBox') THISFORM.SETALL('ENABLED', .F., 'ComboBox') THISFORM.SETALL('ENABLED', .F., 'Spinner')
THISFORM.CLOSABLE = .T.
SELECT usuarios **END TRANSACTION = TABLEUPDATE(.T.)
*SET SKIP OF MENU _MSYSMENU .F.
THISFORM.REFRESH ENDIF ENDIF
ENDPROC
